title: COD4 Memhack 1.5 - Wall hack, no recoil Etc.
description:
CoD4 Memhack 1.5
Current Features;
Nametags
DistanceTags (See tags through walls)
NoRecoil
WallHack
CVAR/DVAR Bypass. (Allows you to use commands like cg_drawshellshock 0 etc.)
NoFog
Remove ShellShock
NoSmoke
Punkbuster Screenshot Cleaner

One thing to add about the CVAR/DVAR Bypass. I&#039;m not sure if it&#039;s ok to use on PsB and PBbans servers. Cause they do extra consistency scans or something like that. So if "cg_drawshellshock" is at "0" when the scan takes place then it&#039;ll kick you. But only about 10% of servers run this. If you&#039;re afraid of that.. Just dont change those in the console.
How To Use; (Make sure your Punkbuster AND game(1.5) is up to date!)
1. Download (Obviously )
2. Unzip all files to the desktop or whatever.
3. Run aids.exe.
4. Click the button [...] under DLL and locate "FisH4.dll"
5. Under Method choose Stealth. (leave everything else as it is.)
6. Under Process in the dropdown box find iw3mp.exe(the game) and press the [INJECT] button.
7. CLOSE THE INJECTOR BEFORE JOINING A SERVER
8. Join a server and press the hotkeys.

Hotkeys;
NUMPAD1 = Name&Distance Tags.
NUMPAD2 = NoRecoil
NUMPAD3 = Wallhack
NUMPAD4 = NoFog
NUMPAD5 = Remove ShellShock
NUMPAD6 = NoSmoke
CVAR bypass is always on.
PBSS Cleaner is always on.
